name: Leatherman Free T4 Multipurpose Tool
description: Leatherman’s new magnetic deployment system gives you smooth, easy access to what you need with an easy roll of your thumb. It's loaded with Leatherman’s most useful tools: compact knife, scissors and screwdrivers. And a cam-lock mechanism keeps your tools safely locked in place until you’re done.Magnetic architecture means no more nail-nicks.Easy, intuitive design gives you ready access to tools, even when wearing gloves.Magnets smoothly release every tool.Drop-point style straight-edge knife.Scissors for jobs like cutting medical tape or opening packages.Stealthy tweezers are there for life’s littlest jobs.Deep carry pocket clip keeps your tool close to hand, yet tucked cleanly out of the way.12 different tools to help you turn that ‘To Do’ list into a ‘Done’ list.Bronze bushings for smooth openings.All tools lock into place.Contoured and textured handles are grippy and give a nod to the original Leatherman PST.Handle is made up of stainless steel and rugged glass-reinforced nylon.
